= Documentation =

==User documentation==

The first source of documentation for *javapns* is the [http://code.google.com/p/javapns/w/list wiki].  It contains information about software requirements, usage, tips, examples and other relevant information.


==Java documentation (javadoc)==

_javadoc_ for the latest public release is available from the [http://code.google.com/p/javapns/downloads/list Downloads] page.

_javadoc_ for nightly builds is available in [http://code.google.com/p/javapns/source/browse/branches/javapns2/ SVN].


==APNS documentation==
Documentation on the _Apple Push Notification Service_ can be found here:
 * [http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/#documentation/NetworkingInternet/Conceptual/RemoteNotificationsPG/CommunicatingWIthAPS/CommunicatingWIthAPS.html Communicating with APS]  (web version)
 * [http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/NetworkingInternet/Conceptual/RemoteNotificationsPG/RemoteNotificationsPG.pdf Communication with APS]  (PDF version)
 * [http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/#technotes/tn2265/_index.html Technical note about push notifications]
